data.name: Warface - Open Cup Sniper Set
data.detailed_description:
Open Cup Sniper Set


The Open Cup set equipment includes gear for the Sniper and the bolt-action sniper rifle Orsis T-5000. The items are allowed in the games official eSports tournaments, as well as in a ranked match. They are well suited for PvP battles.



The uniforms have an impressive defense against headshots, as well as explosions and flash grenades. They also increase the reload speed and the weapon change speed.



The helmet will help you restore health quicker, the vest will reduce damage by 10 points per hit, gloves will increase accuracy, and tournament boots will help you use the sprint more effectively and avoid claymores.

By equipping all 4 items from the set, your armor will increase by 15 additional points.



This is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It offers high accuracy and extreme penetration power. Not even strong protective gear will protect sufficiently against a direct hit.

The rifle offers its owner devastating damage, which is offset by its low range and modest ammunition.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
